ValidationRule.description: Prevents Lead conversion unless the Lead requires sales-assisted handling and meets minimum qualification criteria: Working status, Interested = Yes, Email populated, and Lead Source populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( IsConverted, OR( NOT(Sales_Assisted__c), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Interested__c, "Yes")), ISBLANK(Email), ISBLANK(TEXT(LeadSource)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage:
Lead cannot be converted.
To convert a Lead: • Sales Assisted must be checked • Status must be "Working" • Interested must be "Yes" • Email must be populated • Lead Source must be populated
